query:
insert into underway.task (
                  id,
                  task_queue_name,
                  input,
                  timeout,
                  heartbeat,
                  ttl,
                  delay,
                  run_at,
                  retry_policy,
                  concurrency_key,
                  priority
                )
                select
                  t.id,
                  $1 as task_queue_name,
                  t.input,
                  $2 as timeout,
                  $3 as heartbeat,
                  $4 as ttl,
                  t.delay,
                  now() + t.delay,
                  $5 as retry_policy,
                  $6 as concurrency_key,
                  $7 as priority
                from unnest(
                  $8::uuid[],
                  $9::jsonb[],
                  $10::interval[]
                ) as t(id, input, delay)
